content.raw:
Not sure if they're already there, but also add tooltips that appear on button hover.

Reset All: "Resets camera view, arm/hand, and test objects to original positions."
Reset Objects: "Resets test objects to original postions."
Next Test: "Skips to next test."
content.html:
Not sure if they're already there, but also add tooltips that appear on button hover.

Reset All: "Resets camera view, arm/hand, and test objects to original positions." Reset Objects: "Resets test objects to original postions." Next Test: "Skips to next test."
